affymetrix.gcos.cdf
Class CDFProbeInformation

java.lang.Object
  affymetrix.gcos.cdf.CDFProbeInformation

public class CDFProbeInformation
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides storage for an individual probe in a CDF file.

Field Summary
private  int expos
          The expos value in the CDF file, this can either be a zero based index equal to the list index or the exon position.
private  int listIndex
          The index of the probes probe pair or quartet (probe list).
private  char pbase
          The probes base at the interrogation position
static int PROBE_SIZE
          The size of the probe object as stored in the XDA CDF file.
static int PROBE_SIZE_V2
          The size of the probe object as stored in the XDA CDF file, version 4+.
private  short probeGrouping
          The probe grouping
private  short probeLength
          The probe length
private  char tbase
          The targets base at the interrogation position
private  int x
          The X coordinate
private  int y
          The Y coordinate

The size of the probe object as stored in the XDA CDF file, version 4+.
